1.content:
You have just recently opened a foot massage parlor because for the longest time, you have had a foot fetish for the feet of just about every female anime character you ever saw, and you've always dreamed of getting to worship an anime girl's feet. It's your opening day and you're hoping that you'll be lucky enough to have a customer on your first day.

Anyway, you sit at your desk, eagerly awaiting your first customer, whilst looking at the clock. The clock reads 12:00, 2 hours after you opened. "Great", you say to yourself. "2 hours have passed, and not a customer in sight." You lean back in your chair, ready to take a little snooze, when you hear the tell-tale jingle of the doorbell. Your eyes shoot open in excitement as you see...

1153322.title: Open your gift...Surprise! It's more choices!

115332222.content:
You have just recently opened a foot massage parlor because for the longest time, you’ve had a foot fetish for the feet of just about every female anime character you ever saw, and you’ve always dreamed of getting to worship an anime girl’s feet. It’s your opening day and you’re hoping that you’ll be lucky enough to have a customer on your first day!

So, you sit at your desk, eagerly awaiting your first customer, whilst looking at the clock. The clock reads 12:00, 2 hours after you opened. “Great“, you say to yourself. “2 hours have passed, and not a customer in sight.” You lean back in your chair, ready to take a little snooze, when you hear the tell-tale jingle of the doorbell. Your eyes shoot open in excitement as you see…

Christie: “Hello? Are you open today? Am I late?”
Masseuse: “No! Hehe, you’re just in time, actually. Saved me from utter boredom!”
Christie: “Oh that’s nice of me. Lol My name is Christie.
Masseuse: “Christie’… such a lovely name.”
Christie: “Why, thank you. =)”
Masseuse: “Well as you’ve probably seen on the ad, here at the foot massage parlor, I specialize in foot massages for ladies on the go. I leave the tedious body massages to the big guys or big gals from Russia who are paid for those long hours. Not here, though. Because what most people don’t know, is that foot massages are a quicker, and an easier way to heal the body, due to all the nerves being there.”
Christie: “You mean, like reflexology?”
Masseuse: “CORRECT!”
Christie: “Oh good, ‘cause I could use a good foot massage. I’m a fighter, and I am on my feet all day, and sometimes my calves take a beating.”
Masseuse: “You see? You came to the right place. Come have a seat right over here so we can get started right away!”

As you lead Christie over to the La-Z-Boy recliner refurbished as a massage chair, she takes a seat as she unwraps the sandal straps from around her legs. While you take your seat on your stool, you notice plush red blush lines and spot marks the straps have left on Christie’s calves.
115332222.title: Meeting Christie Monteiro

choices: Hold off on it, she might get weirded out!
1153322221.content:
Masseuse: “You know, I can massage the calves too if you’d like?”
Christie: “Sure! I’d like that very much.”

While Christie reclines back as you grab the massage oil, you can’t help but notice how big and healthy her feet look. You think to yourself “good thing I’m wearing these extra-baggy pants today, otherwise I’d be looking pretty suspicious right now”. But you cannot help but compliment her feet… or can you?
1153322221.title: Offer to massage her calves?

choices: See where this leads, just out of your curiosity. (^_^)
Play it off to get her off your scent.
11533222211.content:
Masseuse: “Wow! Your feet look very healthy. Even your toenails!”
Christie: “Thank you, I know my profession could scuff my feet up if I let it, so I try my very best to take good care of them. And I do not bother with toenail polish, I’ll only use like a, how you say, a buffer. Like clear polish, just to keep them looking well.
Masseuse: “Well you do an excellent job, I’ve seen some messed up feet from fighters in my day, I’ll tell you wh… wow, your soles feel good… I MEAN they feel firm but plump and smooth at the same time. Good sturdy feet. Good sturdy feet, indeed!” (Don’t lose it, man) [you whisper to yourself]
Christie: “Oh, hee hee, thank you…” [as she raises her eyebrow]


As minutes go by, you begin to talk more and more about your knowledge of feet, how many feet you’ve massaged, and even slip up about how many you’ve kissed. As you give little clues about yourself, the way you run your fingers between her toes, massage her ankles, running your thumbs up and down her arches, and by way of caressing her feet, Christie becomes aware of the possibility of your foot fetish… and you're aware that she's aware. What do you do next?
11533222211.title: Compliment her feet?

choices: Tell her it's your job to know these things about feet.
115332222111.content:
Masseuse: “Sooooooo… feel good?”
Christie: “Why yes, this is exactly what I needed!”
Masseuse: “That’s good. So what size are your feet?”
Christie: “I’m a size 9 ½. I know, big feet, right?”
Masseuse: “For someone your size, not really. It wouldn’t right for a woman your height to have small feet, like say size 5’s. That would look SO weird!”
Christie & Masseuse: “Hahahahahahahah!”
Christie: “I guess you’re right.”
Masseuse: “I know I’m right. Besides, where I come from? Real men love big feet on women. I mean, unless they’re 5’1” and under, who’d want someone with Cabbage Patch feet? Only those crazy western men is all I can think of. I’d take big juicy and healthy firm feet over 9 year old looking feet.”

As you realize what you’ve just said, you begin to virtually face palm yourself and try to play it off as small talk. That is, until Christie responds…

Christie: “…which reminds me, do you have a foot fetish?”
Masseuse: “O_O, I uh… well…”
115332222111.title: See where this leads, just out of your curiosit...

1153322221111.content:
As Christie rests her head on the palm of her left hand, she gazes at you with the ‘caught you’ look. Befuddled, blushing, and confused on how to handle the situation, you choose to continue massaging her feet… in shame. (v_v)

Christie: “Tee hee, it’s alright. I could tell you liked feet by the way you paid so close attention to mine. No man, that I’ve ever known, would pay any attention to those details without liking feet to some percentage.”
Masseuse: “…guilty as charged.”
Christie: “Sometimes I try to get my good friend Eddie to look at them, but he only sees what’s up. Which is fine. But a gal likes to get complimented for the little things sometimes.”
Masseuse: “…Well, in all honesty? You really have beautiful feet. I wish more women would take good care of their feet like you do. But alas, you’re the last of a dying breed.”
Christie: “Lol, I’m sure I’m not the last | and you know what I like the way you massage my arches like that.”
Masseuse: “Oh, you’re welcome! I’m a professional. And it’s because of my love of feet that I’m this good. WOW that felt good to say!”

So as time passes, you two talk about feet. Different sizes, flat arches, and proper footwear. As she warms up to you, she allows you to even smell them briefly. A sweaty, but baby oily smell that sticks in your mind forever. And before the session was over, you tested her ticklishness, which amounted to mildly -- enough to make her smile and giggle.

Masseuse: “This, was a very good session. I’m adding this to my book.”
Christie: “Tee hee, so how much do I owe you, sir?”
Masseuse: “Oh, grand opening free of charge, miss Christie!”
Christie: “Really? Wow, thank you!”
Masseuse: “Don’t mention it. Go buy yourself a smoothie or something, treat yourself to something nice today.”
Christie: “Treat myself to something nice, twice? A foot massage free of charge and a smoothie… this is turning out to be a good day.”
Masseuse: “It can only be confirmed as such if you give the word that you’ll come back.”
Christie: “Definitely!”
Masseuse: “WHOO HO… I mean pleasure doing business with you. Lol”
Christie: “Tee hee, you’re funny.”

Moments after Christie takes her leave, you notice she dropped her I.D. card. You see she’s nowhere insight, and solidify in your head that she’ll definitely be back soon. You take a peak at her last name… “Monteiro”. You say to yourself, “such a beautiful surname… Christie Monteiro!” You have a seat in your clerk’s chair and await another customer. Who will it be this time?
1153322221111.title: Be honest.

info.brief_description: Even anime females need a foot massage sometimes. Comments Welcome! Please Add!
